vulnerability_findings.name: reentrancy-eth
vulnerability_findings.message:
Reentrancy in ETH_FUND.CashOut (patch_2.sol#26-36):
	External calls:
	- msg.sender.call.value(_am)() (patch_2.sol#31-33)
	- TransferLog.AddMessage(msg.sender,_am,CashOut) (patch_2.sol#32)
	External calls sending eth:
	- msg.sender.call.value(_am)() (patch_2.sol#31-33)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- reentrancyLock (patch_2.sol#35)

vulnerability_findings.name: reentrancy-benign
vulnerability_findings.message:
Reentrancy in ETH_FUND.Deposit (patch_2.sol#18-24):
	External calls:
	- TransferLog.AddMessage(msg.sender,msg.value,Deposit) (patch_2.sol#21)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- lastBlock (patch_2.sol#22)
